name: Spider Prototype
description:
Spider is a fast-paced platformer with a focus on unique movement challenges. The player has the ability to run and jump on the walls and ceilings. The goal of the game is to clear each level in the fastest time possible.

The game features 30 short levels based around and building off of the surface running mechanics. Can you conquer all of them?

GAMEPAD CONTROLS (RECOMMENDED):

Left Analog Stick to Move

A Button to Jump

R Trigger to Sprint

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys to Move

Z Key to Jump

Shift Key to Sprint
